articles.description: Gold futures climbed Sunday, posting a weekly gain of more than 4%. Anxieties grew after the latest Russian assault in Ukraine saw Putin's forces take over Ukraine's largest nuclear power facility following shelling that started a fire at the plant.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Dollar broadly firmer, euro extends slide early Monday - Fox Business
articles.description: The euro extended its slide early Monday, hitting parity against the safe haven Swiss franc, and commodities of all stripes were on the rise as the Russian-Ukraine conflict showed no sign of cooling.

articles.title: Indian police arrest NSE stock exchange's former chief - Reuters India
articles.description: India's federal police on Sunday arrested the former chief executive of the National Stock Exchange of India in a case related to alleged governance lapses at India's top bourse, a source with direct knowledge told Reuters.

articles.title: Dollar Strength Builds as Ukraine War Deepens - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The ICE U.S. Dollar index hits its highest level since May 2020 as investors dash to safer assets
articles.content:
Escalating conflict between Russia and Ukraine has sent investors dashing to safer assets, propelling the dollar to its highest level since the coronavirus-induced volatility of two years ago.
